definition: ventilation/aeration/to keep each other informed/to release information
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Maximal oxygen uptake and minute ventilation did not change in either group.
sentences.chinese: 最大耗氧量和每分钟通气量，两组均未发生显著改变。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo compare the effect of the normal frequency jet ventilation with the high frequency jet ventilation in suspension laryngoscopy.
sentences.chinese: 比较常频通气与高频通气在支撑喉镜手术前应用效果。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo compare the effect of the normal frequency jet ventilation with the high frequency jet ventilation in suspension laryngoscopy.
sentences.chinese: 比较常频通气与高频通气在支撑喉镜手术前应用效果。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experiences in the diagnosis and therapy of hyperventilation syndrome of yong servicemen.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结青年军人过度通气综合征的诊断与治疗经验。

sentences.english: We report on an unusual case of penetrating tracheal injury caused by a needlefish.
sentences.chinese: 我们报告一个被针鱼刺伤穿通气管的罕见个案。

sentences.english: To summarize the guardianship of mechanical ventilation to treat respiratory failure.
sentences.chinese: 总结机械通气治疗呼吸衰竭的监护经验。

sentences.english: Several notable researchers are studying the effects of hyperventilation.
sentences.chinese: 几位著名的研究人员正在研究通气过度的后果。

sentences.english: In rain or fog ventilation is not particularly humid environment not construction.
sentences.chinese: 在雨天雾天或特别潮湿不通气的环境中不能施工。

sentences.english: Will Suarez be playing in flippers and snorkel.
sentences.chinese: 苏亚雷斯会不会戴着脚蹼和通气管上场踢球？

sentences.english: In this case, the change to semi-sitting position and relevant medication helped reestablish her ventilation and save her life.
sentences.chinese: 在此病例中，半坐卧姿势及药物重建了其呼吸道通气。

sentences.english: More ventilatory threshold intensity can make the brain cells tired.
sentences.chinese: 大于通气阈强度运动后易使中枢神经细胞产生疲劳。

sentences.english: Employee got his toe caught in a vent cover.
sentences.chinese: 被通气孔的盖子卡伤了脚趾头。

sentences.english: Methods Patients were subjected to bronchoscope to be offered high frequency jet ventilation after general anesthesia.
sentences.chinese: 方法全麻后经支气管镜的供氧管行高频喷射通气供氧。

sentences.english: Conclusion: One lung ventilation was well tolerated in regard to hemodynamics and blood gas analyses in piglets.
sentences.chinese: 结论幼猪可以较好地耐受单肺通气麻醉胸腔镜手术。

sentences.english: Introduction: Prolonged mechanical ventilation has the potential to aggravate or initiate pulmonary inflammation and cause lung damage through fibrin deposition.
sentences.chinese: 长时间机械通气会加重或引起肺部炎症，导致肺损伤。

definition: to unblock/to dredge/to clear the way/to get things flowing/to facilitate/to mediate/to lobby/to explicate (a text)
to reduce the pressure (of a fluid)/to lower one's blood pressure/to lower (or step down) the voltage
to detoxify/to relieve fever (in Chinese medicine)
